com.example.fud.Fragments

Class PantryFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.fud.Fragments.PantryFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.Observer<PantryList>, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner

    public class PantryFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements androidx.lifecycle.Observer<PantryList>
    The pantry class loads a user's pantry. Can add and remove items and will update the server.
    Since:
    3-26-2020

      • onChanged

        public void onChanged(PantryList pant)
        This method handles whenever the pantry in the LiveData container is changed. It will dynamically create the table layout with the items and checkboxes so if one/multiple lists are selected they can be deleted. Also gives the ability to add items.
        Specified by:
        onChanged in interface androidx.lifecycle.Observer<PantryList>
        Parameters:
        pant - The PantryList variable we are observing.
